advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_open: Open the Book of the Shapeshifter
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_end_: So it's not permanent. Good to know
My theory is... golden magic possesses powerful stability
Successfully borrowed the cursed moon's magic to restore original form
Yes, this is a characteristic of lunar magic, definitely not a bug
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_get_: Attempt to approach creatures emanating cursed sigils and obtain their effects
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_slee: Sleep while under the curse's effect. What could possibly go wrong?
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_tran: So this is what the magic within you does...
It won't stop at this stage
Your current form has been altered so thoroughly that reversal seems impossible... or is it?
Use a catalyst while under the curse's effect
A completely different type of magic
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_use_: Use a golden apple to counteract the effects of instincts
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_tran: Hmm... I think I prefer my current form
advancements.shape-shifter-curse.on_trig: As the differently colored moon rises, you feel the magic within you resonating with it...
You've regained your previous form... at least until the lunar magic fades. Perhaps you should seize this opportunity
effect.shape-shifter-curse.moondust_poti: The essence of moondust surges within, it requires further processing
effect.shape-shifter-curse.to_ocelot_0_p: You'll want to stock up on raw meat
effect.shape-shifter-curse.to_familiar_f: It has been altered.. maybe use a gold nuggets to purify it?
effect.shape-shifter-curse.to_snow_fox_0: After purification, you feel it's slightly cold to the touch
effect.shape-shifter-curse.feed_effect: Bottled high-density energy, capable of restoring satiety
item.shape-shifter-curse.book_of_shape_s: 'This book's secrets are only revealed to shapeshifters'
item.shape-shifter-curse.untreated_moond: A strange substance dropped by certain creatures during cursed moons
item.shape-shifter-curse.catalyst.toolti: The magic within you seems to react when you touch this
item.shape-shifter-curse.powerful_cataly: It might take your transformation to next level..permanently. Are you REALLY going to do this?
item.shape-shifter-curse.inhibitor.toolt: The magic within you seems to calm when you touch this
item.shape-shifter-curse.creative_inhibi: (Creative Item) Crafted by powers beyond this world, capable of reversing permanent forms
item.shape-shifter-curse.morphscale_armo: The moon-dust magic infused in these armors automatically adapts to your form
screen.shape-shifter-curse.book_of_shape:
As you attempt to open the book, you feel strange magic flowing into your body through your fingertips with a faint tingling sensation, making you jerk your hand back instinctively
Could this be some kind ofcurse? You're not sure
However, you're certain that continuing to open this book will lead to unknown consequences

Note:
This will activate the Shapeshifter's Curse mod content
This mod may not be a mod for everyone. Before proceeding, ensure you understand its themes and gameplay
Open the Book of the Shapeshifter
info.shape-shifter-curse.on_enable_mod: As the pages open, powerful magic sealed within the book floods into your body!
info.shape-shifter-curse.on_enable_mod_a:
When you regain your senses, you notice... you seem unchanged?
Perhaps you should check the book's contents..
info.shape-shifter-curse.before_cursed_m: You feel magic stirring within you. The cursed moon will rise next night...
You feel magic stirring within you. The cursed moon will rise somewhere soon—even in other dimensions, you can't get rid of it
info.shape-shifter-curse.cursed_moon_for: You feel a strange force pushing time forward. The cursed moon will rise next night...
info.shape-shifter-curse.on_cursed_moon: The magic within you surges—the cursed moon has risen
info.shape-shifter-curse.on_cursed_moon_: The magic within you surges—the cursed moon has risen somewhere
Strangely, it doesn't seem to visibly affect your current [special] form...
However, it can no longer affect your permanently changed form in any way...
Tonight's moon looks peculiar. Whether due to its influence or not, monsters have become restless
info.shape-shifter-curse.end_cursed_moon: The cursed moon's influence fades. Your magic calms, returning you to your pre-moon form
The cursed moon's influence fades. Your magic calms
The cursed moon has set, and its influence on other creatures fades away with it
The peculiar moon has set, and its influence on other creatures fades away with it
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_sle: In your sleep, the curse's magic intensified, altering your body...
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_tim: The curse's effects fade. The magic within you quiets down
info.shape-shifter-curse.end_cursed_moon: The cursed moon's influence fades. Golden magic stabilizes your current form
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_use: Golden magic briefly quiets your magic, but it soon resurges. To truly dispel it, you might need other methods...
info.shape-shifter-curse.transformed_by_: Golden magic successfully reversed your transformation! Your magic stabilizes
Golden magic partially reversed your transformation!
info.shape-shifter-curse.permanent_form_: You feel nothing. It has no effect on your permanently altered form

You resort to more potent magic, but to no avail
Your permanently transformed form cannot be reversed any more
info.shape-shifter-curse.max_form_used_c: Golden magic has no effect on your current form... Only some greater influence might reverse it
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_use: Disappointingly, the magic briefly calms then resurges. It seems golden magic isn't sufficient to fully dispel the curse...
info.shape-shifter-curse.transformed_by_: Powerful golden magic nearly completely reversed your transformation! The magic within lies dormant, awaiting the next opportunity...
info.shape-shifter-curse.max_form_used_c: It worked! Enhanced golden magic reversed part of your transformation
info.shape-shifter-curse.origin_form_use: The catalyst agitates your magic, which eventually settles. It seems they need clearer direction...
The catalyst activated the curse's magic, altering your body...
info.shape-shifter-curse.use_catalyst: The catalyst further excites the magic within...
info.shape-shifter-curse.max_form_used_c: Your current form is so thoroughly altered that normal catalysts won't have any effect..
info.shape-shifter-curse.max_form_used_p: Under the effect of the powerful catalyst, permanent changes have taken root in your body...
info.shape-shifter-curse.form_used_power: The powerful catalyst has no effect on your current form
info.shape-shifter-curse.sp_form_used_ca: Your current form contains special magic that catalysts can't influence...
effect.shape-shifter-curse.to_bat_0_effe: You suddenly feel extremely drowsy, maybe you should sleep?
power.origins.vegetarian.name: vegetarian
codex.status.infected:
For unknown reasons, you're overwhelmed by sudden drowsiness, while sensing magical changes within
Perhaps you should sleep?
codex.status.before_moon: You feel magic stirring within. The cursed moon will rise next night...
codex.status.under_moon:
The cursed moon alters your body...
Its effects fade at dawn. But... perhaps you should utilize this opportunity?
codex.desc.appearance_normal: Your body feels no different than usual. Maybe your internal magic needs certain triggers to manifest?
codex.desc.pros_normal: Currently, the magic within grants no noticeable benefits
codex.desc.cons_normal: Currently, the magic within causes no negative effects
codex.desc.instincts_normal:
Examining yourself, you sense shifting magic within your body, but nothing more.
Your mind remains calm, maintaining awareness of surroundings
codex.desc.appearance_0: Magical resonance with creatures causes physical changes. At this stage, a golden apple can completely reverse them...
codex.desc.pros_0: Your new form grants special abilities...
codex.desc.instincts_0: New thoughts emerge in your mind...
codex.desc.appearance_1:
Intensified magic further alters your body. You sense it seeking new equilibrium - completely different from your original self.
Using a golden apple before progression might be wise...
codex.desc.instincts_1: Creature instincts grow stronger... Maybe resist them
codex.desc.appearance_2:
The magic has nearly remade you. It's stabilized - even golden apples can't help...
Unless some greater influence reignites its flow...
codex.desc.instincts_2: Instincts no longer disturb you - they've become part of you
codex.desc.instincts_3:
Examining yourself, you feel the ever-shifting magic within you has reached a new state of stability - unshaken even by the cursed moon
Your form has been permanently altered
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.original_: Overall, you are a normal human being
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.axolotl_0: The curse has caused visible changes to your body. Additionally, you feel an urge to immerse yourself in water.

Pale red frond-like structures have grown on both sides of your cheeks. They remain constantly moist and seem to supplement your oxygen supply
You notice wavy translucent fins forming at your extremities and on the newly grown tail
Your skin has begun to feel noticeably damp

Thanks to additional oxygen absorption, you can stay underwater longer
Your skin offers less resistance underwater, allowing slightly faster movement in aquatic environments
Your skin easily accumulates particles and dust, slightly slowing your movement on loose terrain

You begin cravingto stay in water
You begin to desire to stay in lush cave biomes
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.axolotl_1: Your enlarged gills and powerful tail enable free exploration of submerged structures. Freshly caught fish make ideal nourishment

The gill fronds on your cheeks have expanded further. When submerged, they can supply nearly all your oxygen needs
Fins now cover more of your body, their colors growing more vibrant
Your tail has lengthened and strengthened
Water-absorbent white filaments have grown around your neck

With enhanced gills, you can breathe underwater indefinitely
You move slightly faster in water. Your new fins and slick skin harness currents, granting swift movement against water flow
Your body efficiently digests raw fish, providing greater satiation
Strong regeneration slowly restores health when hunger is above 3 bars
Using your powerful tail, you can leap from water surfaces to higher ground

Helmet equipment is impossible - your gills reject foreign contact
Skin and fins easily accumulate particles/sand, reducing speed on loose ground
Your digestive system can no longer process non-meat foods

The desire toremain in water
You begin to desire to stay in lush cave biomes
Hunt down and consume more raw fishgrows stronger
The urge to wander through drip-leaf clustersintensifies
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.axolotl_2: As an amphibious predator, you dominate aquatic environments while remaining functional on land - though moisture must be maintained

Your tail now functions as a true extension of your torso, comprising nearly half your height
Prominent gill fronds occupy significant head space. When moistened, they provide abundant oxygen, eliminating lung dependency
Translucent fins extend across most of your body, rhythmically undulating underwater
White filaments cover your chest and back like a spongy layer, storing moisture for extended land excursions

Your gill-dependent physiology requires constant moisture—
Your oxygen bar now indicates moisture level. It replenishes in water and depletes slowly on land
Consuming water bottles or any potions also restores moisture

Your body draws strength from water. Your maximum health increases when you have moisture level
Powerful regeneration slowly heals you when well-hydrated and above 3 hunger bars
Raw fish provide greater satiation

Your powerful tail enables faster aquatic movement. You can leap freely from water surfaces and sprint forward underwater by pressing sprint
Fully developed fins act like sails, harnessing water currents for rapid travel
Blunt claws provide exceptional grip for unobstructed block breaking underwater
Your streamlined body allows swift crawling through tight spaces

Moisture is now your lifeline. When dehydrated, maximum health and movement speed drastically decrease, nearly immobilizing you

Helmet equipment remains impossible
Moist skin/fins gather particles/dust, slowing movement on loose terrain
You can only consume meat

Something inside you stirs... your transformation hasn't reached its end...
A echo catalyst could take your transformation to the next stage... though this process would likely be permanent
You're NOT actually considering this, are you?
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.axolotl_3: Your body has fully transformed into that of an amphibian animal. To maintain an upright posture for walking, you must lean forward to counterbalance the weight of your tail.

The further-grown tail has become the main structure of your body, adorned with developed fin membranes that allow swift underwater movement.
Your blunt-clawed limbs have grown even shorter and are now positioned more toward the front of your torso. When standing still, you can only maintain an upright posture with the support of your tail.
Your skin is now entirely covered in pale, scale-less tissue. Thanks to the water-storing feathery structure, your skin remains perpetually moist.

Two new clusters of gill filaments extend from the top of your head. Beyond supplying vital oxygen, you sense they grant you some power to perceive and manipulate water currents...

You can breathe freely underwater, and your oxygen bar now indicates your Moisture level.
It can be replenished by submerging in water or consuming water bottles/potions. Now, even on land, your Moisture no depletes over time.

Your body grants hydrokinetic abilities:
While sprinting, you enter 'Wave-Step' state: speed increases and you can step 1-block heights, but turning becomes harder.
During 'Wave-Step', you can expend Moisture to channel water-based powers:
- Cost a small amount of moisture, you can press jump to propel yourself forward with a water current.
- Cost a mid amount of moisture, your attacks can launch enemies back greatly.
- Cost a moderate amount of moisture, you can press sneak to release a small non-destructive water explosion.

You move swiftly in water currents. When fully submerged, you auto-enter sprint swimming without extra hunger drain.
When underwater,you can see more clearly and break blocks unimpeded.
You won't sink underwater. When in water, you can press sprint key to propel yourself forward.
When surfacing, you can leap out of the water.
With Moisture, you regenerate health over time.
Sneaking puts you in a natural crawling stance for tight spaces.
Raw fish provides greater saturation.

Your physiology hinders normal locomotion. Outside 'Wave-Step', your movement become sluggish.
Moisture fuels your strength. Your max health now decreases as Moisture drops; when your moisture is depleted, you will be unable to support your body's weight and can only crawl slowly on the ground.

Helmets can no longer be equipped.
Movement slows further on loose/powdery terrain.
You can only consume meat.
The curse has caused some visible changes. You notice your body moves more naturally when sneaking

Your ears have moved to the top of your head, covered in mottled fur, shaped between triangles and semicircles - somewhat resembling a feline's
Your limb extremities are covered in spotted white fur, resembling thick gloves or socks. Underneath, your fingers seem altered - stronger than before
Fur also grows around your neck, resembling a scarf from afar
Short dense fur covers your abdomen, providing warmth
A small tail extends from your tailbone, covered in gray-white fur. When moving, it slightly affects your balance

Your body is more coordinated, increasing sneaking speed
Rotten flesh is trivial for your new digestive system. You no longer get abnormal hunger
Creepers seem strangely afraid of you

Your body isn't as strong as before - max health slightly decreased
Your digestive system adapts less to non-meat foods - they provide less satiation

You begin to desireeating more raw meat
You begin to desire to stay in jungle biomes
More feline traits let you climb trees freely and deliver deadly blows with powerful forepaws. Raw meat now seems more appealing than cooked

Mottled fur now covers most of your chest, abdomen and back. Connecting to your neck fur, it resembles a cloak
Spotted white fur extends further up your limbs. Underneath, your hands and feet structure becomes more feline - retractable claws and cushioning pads
While lengthening, your tail grows more flexible and powerful. It helps mid-air balance but increasingly affects your walking/running posture

Your claws become deadly, dealing heavy damage barehanded and letting you climb trees and leaves freely
The longer tail helps balance when crouching, allowing near-running sneaking speed and unimpeded jumping
Your footsteps become nearly silent
Your digestive system strengthens - fresh raw meat provides more satiation, rotten flesh won't cause hunger
Creepers avoid you
You excel at mid-air posture adjustment, preventing fall damage from any height

A strange uncoordinated feeling slows your sprinting, as if your body prefers different movement
While more lethal, your body becomes more fragile. Max health decreases further
Other armor feels too heavy. You can only wear leather or chainmail
You can no longer digest non-meat foods

You increasingly want toeat more raw meat
You begin to desire to stay in jungle biomes
You feel an inner urge tohunt more mobs using your bare claw
You feel an inner urge toclimb to treetops
Quadrupedal movement now feels most natural. When crouching, you're nearly indistinguishable from certain large felines

Your head ears grow larger and more flexible - you notice they automatically turn toward sound sources
Your entire body now sports black-spotted fur. Very warm - you'd hate it getting wet
Your hind legs fully become digitigrade, though you can still stand upright barely
With powerful quadruped claws and a tail nearly matching torso length, you can low-center sprint and pounce across fields and forests rapidly. No prey escapes your claws

Thanks to body changes, sneaking enters a quadrupedal hunting stance
In hunting stance, you sprint extremely fast and enter 1-block-high spaces
In hunting stance, jumps become pounces covering great distances

Your heightened senses let you instinctively dodge sideways when projectiles are about to hit you, making them barely miss
Feline eyes let you see clearly even at night
You can deal heavy sweeping damage with your bare-forepaws
Your claws enable climbing trees and leaves
You make no footsteps and take no fall damage
Fresh raw meat provides more satiation
Your body grants strong immunity - no hunger or poison effects
Creepers avoid you

In hunting stance, enhanced physicality rapidly consumes satiation. Below threshold, you can't maintain stance

Digitigrade hind legs make bipedal sprinting impossible
Becoming smaller and lighter further reduces max health
As a swift lethal hunter, aside helmet, you can only wear leather/chainmail witch not affect your movement. You also can't effectively block damage with shields
Faster metabolism increases natural satiation depletion
Your digestive system changes further - raw meat becomes your only edible food

Something inside you stirs... your transformation hasn't reached its end...
A echo catalyst could take your transformation to the next stage... though this process would likely be permanent
You're NOT actually considering this, are you?
'There have been reports of an unusually large white ocelot spotted in the area. Best be cautious when approaching the forest'

Apart from your fur color and body size, you're nearly indistinguishable from a wild ocelot
You're the apex predator of the dense jungle. With your keen eyes and razor-sharp claws, every creature is potential prey

Your body has fully adapted to quadrupedal structure, significantly enhancing your leaping ability. Additionally, maintaining Hunting Stance has been made easier, it no longer accelerates your hunger consumption
Your strengthened claws allow climbing on nearly any surface
Sprinting is replaced with stealth - while sneaking, you can dash forward at tremendous speed and pounce across great distances
Your keen senses let you instinctively dodge incoming projectiles
Night vision grants perfect sight in darkness
You can deal heavy sweeping damage with your bare-forepaws
You produce no footstep sounds and take no fall damage
Fresh raw meat provides greater satiation
Your physiology grants strong immunity to both hunger and poison effects
Creepers will actively avoid you

Your altered physiology restricts you to raw meat diets. Even when idle, your hyperactive metabolism constantly drains hunger - perpetual hunting becomes your only option

Any armor severely hinders your movement. You can now only wear helmets and cannot properly use shields
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_0.tit: The curse has affected your body, making you resemble certain chiropterans. You feel darkness attracting you.
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_0.app:
Membranous appendages extend from your arms' outer sides
Your tailbone protrudes outward forming a small tail
Beyond this, they seem functionally limited
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_0.pro: In darkness, you feel more agile
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_0.con: You can't wear chestplates: new appendages make them incompatible
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_0.ins:
You begin to desire tostay in darkness
You begin to desire to stay in dripstone caves biomes
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_1.tit: New vision and strength make you adept in caves and nighttime darkness. Just thinking about sunlight now discomforts you.
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_1.app:
Your ears now crown your head - large, pointed and forward-facing
Arm membranes have grown further - when jumping you instinctively flap them
Your fingers now somewhat resemble claws, preventing delicate operations though you can still grasp items
Your toes have elongated - thin and long
Your tail has lengthened further
You seem slightly smaller
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_1.pro:
You now see clearly in darkness
Your arms grow stronger, increasing melee damage
While still flightless, membrane flapping lets you jump higher
Your body absorbs non-meat foods more efficiently - increased satiation
In darkness, you feel more agile
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_1.con:
Your new finger structure makes using bows/crossbows impossible
Membranes and new toe structure prevent wearing chestplates and boots
In sunlight, you feel weaker and slower
Your body adapts less to meat - it provides less satiation
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_1.ins:
You increasingly want tostay in darkness
You begin to desire to stay in dripstone caves biomes
The thought of eat more fruits begins to attract you
The thought of jump into air begins to attract you
The thought of be surrounded by dripstones begins to attract you
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_2.tit: As a chiropteran, you enjoy gliding through night skies with your kind.
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_2.app:
Your ears now dominate much head space, detecting minute sounds
Your face extends forward forming a short muzzle with sharp tiny teeth
Your arms fully integrate with wing membranes. Though still too heavy for free flight, they suffice for gliding and diving
Your foreclaws can't handle bulky tools/weapons
New foot claws, digitigrade legs and balancing long tail suit diving/gliding. With effort, you can still run
Body fuzz maintains warmth in chilly caves
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_2.pro:
You now see clearly in darkness. In darkness, you also feel more agile
Your foreclaws are hard and strong, dealing decent barehanded damage. They let you rapidly break blocks and normally harvest ores
While still flightless, membrane flapping boosts jump height and enables slow descent from any height. They function like elytra
Your body absorbs non-meat foods more efficiently - increased satiation
Your size lets you squeeze into 1-block spaces
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_2.con:
Your foreclaws can't grip bulky tools/weapons. When breaking hard blocks or hitting mobs, they just drop
Your foreclaws struggle to even lift bows/crossbows, let alone use them
Membranes and digitigrade legs prevent wearing chestplates, leggings and boots. They slightly slow ground movement
In sunlight, you feel extremely weak and slow
You can't eat meat - your body can't digest it anymore
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_2.ins:
Something inside you stirs... your transformation hasn't reached its end...
A echo catalyst could take your transformation to the next stage... though this process would likely be permanent
You're NOT actually considering this, are you?
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_3.tit: For you now, a cool and dark cavern might be more suitable as your new home..
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_3.app:
Fine, dense fur completely covers your body. Ears nearly as large as your head help you locate your surroundings, ensuring you don't miss even the faintest sounds.
Your forelimbs have extended further to make space for the expansive membrane wings. If you wish, you could wrap your entire body within these wings.
Fore claws and hind paws equipped with hooks allow you to cling to walls or hang upside-down from cave ceilings, just like your kind.
Your body is now fully specialized for flight and gliding. Your hind legs can no longer support your body weight, forcing you to move slowly on the ground in a near-quadrupedal stance.
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_3.pro:
Newly formed hooks grant you the ability to cling and hang upside-down:

While airborne, you can right-click 'use' the side face of a block while empty-handed to cling to it. While clinging, press jump while aiming in a direction to kick off for a high-speed glide in that direction.
While airborne, you can right-click 'use' the underside of a block while empty-handed to hang yourself upside-down from it. While hanging upside-down, your health will slowly regenerate.
Large membrane wings enable you to glide swiftly through the air. Press jump while sprinting to launch into high-speed forward flight. Even while airborne, you can press the sprint key to increase your glide speed.
You can now clearly discern things in darkness.
Hardened and powerful fore claws enhance your melee damage. Additionally, they allow you to dig blocks at high speed barehanded and harvest drops normally.
By flapping your wing membranes, you can jump higher and descend slowly from heights. Naturally, they can also serve as elytra.
Your body now absorbs non-meat foods more effectively, granting higher saturation.
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.bat_3.con:
Due to the shift in your center of gravity, you can now only move slowly on the ground in a nearly quadrupedal posture.
Sunlight now severely affects you. Under sunlight, your maximum health is greatly reduced, and the enhanced melee damage effect cannot be sustained.
Your fore claws are no longer suited for grasping bulky tools and weapons. When you use them to dig hard blocks or swing them to hit monsters, they will merely slip off and drop. Naturally, you can also no longer operate bows or crossbows.
Your membrane wings and digitigrade leg structure make equipping chestplates, leggings, and boots impossible.
You can no longer consume meat; your body has completely lost the ability to digest it.
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.snow_fox_: The curse has begun affecting your body; white fur starts growing all over you. You feel a growing urge to run across snowy ground.

Grey-blue soft fur has grown at the ends of your limbs. You notice its color is slightly darker around your hands and feet.
Your ears have shifted towards the top of your head, becoming triangular and covered in pale grey fur.
Your nails have grown sharper, slightly protruding from the grey-blue fur.
Fluffy white fur gathers around your neck, resembling a scarf from afar.
A tuft of snow-white fur has sprouted at the base of your spine. Touching it, you can feel a bony protrusion hidden within.

Your body feels more energetic, and your running speed has increased.
You discover you can jump slightly higher when leaping during a run.

The fluffy fur covering you makes hot environments unbearable. During the daytime in hot desert biomes or the scorching Nether, your maximum health is slightly reduced.
Your new fur tuft slightly hinders your movement speed while swimming.

You begin to desire to eat some Sweet Berries
You begin to desire to stay in Taiga biomes
You begin to desire to run across snowy ground
White and grey-blue fur spreads further across your body; a fluffy snow-white tail sways behind you.

White and grey-blue fur spreads further across you. Your limbs and upper torso are now almost completely covered in thick fur.
The triangular ears atop your head have enlarged further, allowing you to hear even fainter sounds.
Your hands and feet have grown larger, becoming more claw-like in structure.
The fur around your neck has grown denser, providing excellent warmth... perhaps too much warmth.
The white fur tuft at your tailbone has grown into a full, fluffy tail. Its tip is a darker shade and sways gently behind you.

Something noteworthy: despite being purified, you can still feel a foreign magic within you... it feels cold, icy.

The chilling magic within grants you new abilities. Snowballs you throw are empowered to deal more damage.

Foxes trust you. They won't run away.
Your running speed has increased. Your new fur allows you to move freely through Sweet Berry bushes, and Sweet Berries also provide more saturation.
You find your body better suited for jumping. You can jump higher during a sprint, and your jump critical damage has increased.

Your fluffy fur isn't the only reason for your aversion to heat... it seems connected to the cold magic within.

During the daytime in hot desert biomes or the scorching Nether, your maximum health is further reduced.
Additionally, when you are very close to lava or in lava, you will gradually take damage, even with fire resistance effects.
Your movement speed in water is slightly decreased.
You now feel unnatural dizziness when attacking Illagers.

The idea of jump-attacking enemies begins to appeal to you
The idea of jumping while sprinting begins to appeal to you
You begin to desire to stay in Taiga biomes
The idea of lingering within Sweet Berry bushes begins to appeal to you
You now bear a striking resemblance to an upright-walking snow fox.

Your hind feet have become fully digitigrade. Your face has pushed forward into a short muzzle, making you look more like a beast.
Your tail is now nearly half your body length. Its excessively thick fur causes the tip to droop slightly under gravity.
Apart from the grey-blue paws, the triangular ears on your head, and the light grey fur at the tail's tip, your body is completely covered in thick snow-white fur. It serves as excellent camouflage in snowy terrain.
The fur ruff around your neck has become fluffier, even adding noticeable weight to your shoulders.

You feel yourself becoming increasingly accustomed to the presence of that cold magic within...

You've adapted better to the frigid magic within your body, allowing you to harness its stronger powers:
Snowballs you throw deal more damage. Infused with icy magic, your snowballs can turn water into ice and even solidify lava.

Your transformed body grants you new muscle memory. While sprinting, timing your jumps correctly enables a triple jump with increasing height.
Mastering jumping techniques now increases your critical jump damage based on fall distance, up to 2x maximum.
Your sprinting speed is faster, and you can move freely through sweet berry bushes.
Sweet berries restore more hunger.
Foxes trust you and won't flee.
You can now walk safely on powdered snow.

The frigid magic within your body also brings side effects:

You take additional burning damage when on fire.
During daytime in hot desert biomes or the scorching Nether, your maximum health is further reduced.
Additionally, being very close to or submerged in lava causes gradual damage, even with fire resistance.
Leggings and boots no longer fit your new body structure.
Your fluffy fur further slows your movement speed in water.

A faint tremor resonates deep within you: the transformation upon you has not yet reached its conclusion.
A dose of Resonant Catalyst could push your transformation to the next stage... but this process would likely be permanent.
You're not seriously considering this, are you?
You have fully embraced the cold magic within, allowing it to fundamentally change you. It's time to find a new den in the snowy woods..

Apart from an exceptionally fluffy neck ruff and a tail nearly as long as your body, your overall appearance is indistinguishable from a wild snow fox.
Your eyes now unmistakably belong to a wild creature. In sunlight, your pupils contract into slits.

The cold magic within has completely fused with your original transformative magic, forever becoming something entirely new...
Moisture in the air condenses into tiny ice crystals near you. You feel no cold even in blizzards. However, what was once temperate weather now feels unbearably hot to you.
It seems you must accept this.

The cold magic is now one with you:
Snowballs you throw deal immense damage, rivaling arrows. Infused with frost magic, you can use them to turn water into ice and even harden lava.

Quadrupedal movement grants you extreme agility:
While falling, you can right-click 'use' the ground to leverage your fore claws and nimbly vault yourself back into the air.
While maintaining a sprint, by timing successive jumps, you can trigger a triple jump where each jump gains height.
Your jump critical damage increases with fall distance, up to a maximum of 2 times the normal damage.

Your small size makes you harder to hit with ranged attacks
Your running speed is faster, and you can move freely through Sweet Berry bushes.
Sweet Berries provide more saturation.
Foxes trust you. They won't run away.
You can now walk on Powder Snow.

The cold magic that constitutes your body brings significant side effects:
Fire and heat are your greatest enemies. You take additional damage while burning, and fire on you won't extinguish naturally unless you enter water or extinguish it with a water bottle.
During the daytime in hot desert biomes or the scorching Nether, your maximum health is drastically reduced. Furthermore, the warm Plains biome is now uncomfortably hot for you, reducing your maximum health while you are in it.
When you are very close to lava or open flame, or in lava, you will gradually take damage, even with fire resistance effects.
Leggings and boots no longer fit your quadrupedal body structure.
Without proper hands for tools, your block-breaking speed is slower
Your fluffy fur further hinders your movement speed while swimming.
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.familiar_: The curse has affected your body - orange-red fur patches are growing across your skin. You feel an urge to run across snowy plains

Black soft fur grows at your extremities, gradually transitioning to orange-red as it spreads upward
Your ears have shifted to the top of your head, becoming triangular and covered in black fur
Your nails have grown sharper, standing out noticeably against the dark fur
Orange-red fur patches appear sporadically across your body, most notably a red-and-white tuft growing from your lower back. When touched, you can feel hidden bony protrusions within

To your puzzlement, witches no longer seem hostile toward you
Your body feels more energetic, granting increased running speed
Enhanced perception helps you find more dropped items, roughly equivalent to Looting I

Your new fur growth slightly reduces your swimming speed
Strangely, attacking witches causes unusual dizziness

You begin to desire to sweet berries
You begin to desire to running across snow
You begin to desire to stay in taiga biomes
Orange-red fur continues spreading across your body as a fluffy red tail sways behind you

The orange-red pelt expands further across your body, nearly covering your limbs and upper torso with thick fur
Your triangular ears have enlarged, sharpening your hearing. Red fur growing from their base now covers parts of your head and face like a mask
Your hands and feet have grown larger, becoming more claw-like
The fur tuft at your tailbone has developed into a full fluffy tail that sways slowly

Worryingly, beyond the usual shifting magic, you detect a new type of magic blending within you...

The foreign magic grants new abilities - you can now right-click while empty-handed to drain energy from weak creatures for hunger restoration

All illagers strangely show no hostility toward you
Your running speed increases further, and your new fur protects you from sweet berry bushes
Sharper perception helps find more dropped items (~Looting II)

The foreign magic affects your digestion, reducing hunger gained from food
Your health is slightly reduced
Your fur slows swimming slightly
Attacking illagers now also start causes unusual dizziness

Thoughts of draining energy from creaturesbegin attracting you
You begin to desire to stay in taiga biomes
Thoughts of staying in sweet berry bushesbegin attracting you
The magic of witches and evokers draws you in - you feel compelled toapproach and observe them
You now closely resemble an upright-walking red fox, but something feels distinctly wrong...

Your hind legs have completely transformed into digitigrade structure, and your face has protruded forward to form a short muzzle, making you appear more beast-like
Except for your black paws, triangular ears on your head, and the white soft fur on your lower face and chest, your body is now completely covered in thick orange-red fur
Two fluffy red tails sway behind you... Wait, two? That's certainly unusual
Azure-blue flames occasionally appear around your body before slowly fading away

It's become clear that the magic inherent in this form has been altered by someone else...

The foreign magic within you has grown stronger. Now you can absorb more saturation from stronger creatures by right-clicking while empty-handed. It also allows you to sense the location of creatures within a certain radius
As a last resort, you can drain energy from hostile creatures - though their energy will weaken you...
Intelligent creatures seem to possess more energy, you can store their energy in empty bottles for later use - perhaps you should try other targets...

The illagers now regard you as an ally and will no longer attack you
Your running speed has increased further, and you can move unhindered through sweet berry bushes
Your enhanced perception helps you find more dropped items, roughly equivalent to the Looting II enchantment
Thanks to the blended magic in your form, you can now brew splash potions of poison, healing and harming directly in your inventory by right-clicking water bottles on corresponding ingredients. You can now stack up to three identical potions.

The foreign magic has further affected your digestive system - most foods now provide significantly less saturation. You'll need to find alternative ways to replenish it

Your health has decreased slightly more
Leg armor and boots no longer suit your new body structure
Your fluffy pelt slows your movement in water even further
When attempting to attack illagers, the foreign magic within you prevents you from harming them
For some reason, villagers have begun fearing you and will actively avoid you
You've noticed that when you look at witches and evokers, you find yourself unconsciously drawn to their magic...

Something inside you stirs... your transformation hasn't reached its end...
A echo catalyst could take your transformation to the next stage... though this process would likely be permanent
You're NOT actually considering this, are you?

'Shape shifters can make perfect familiars. Magically attuned yet sufficiently intelligent...
It seems we've found the correct approach'

You appear nearly indistinguishable from a feral red fox - save for the two unusually large tails swaying behind you
Your eyes now unmistakably belong to a wild creature. In sunlight, your pupils contract into narrow slits
You realize the nature of magic within you has completely changed. The shifting magic has solidified, permanently transformed into something else - something more befitting a familiar...
Azure flames occasionally manifest around your body before slowly fading. These mark your status as a familiar

It seems this will be your new life from now on

Illagers recognize you as an ally and will no longer attack you
Your running speed has increased. Your small size makes you harder to hit with ranged attacks
Due to enhanced familiar magic, you can brew strong splash potions of poison, healing and harming directly in your inventory by right-clicking water bottles on corresponding ingredients. You can now stack up to three identical potions.
Your magical senses allow you to detect nearby creatures through walls
Your thick fur protects you from sweet berry bushes
Familiar magic grants immunity to fire and lava damage. Most status effects no longer affect you, whether beneficial or harmful

Witches and evokers' magic links with your familiar essence. They forbid you from harming illagers and will attempt to control your actions...
As a familiar, normal food no longer sustains you. You must right-click while empty-handed to drain energy from neutral creatures to restore hunger
As a last resort, you can drain energy from hostile creatures - though their energy will weaken you...
Intelligent creatures provide more nourishment. Besides, witches seem eager to supply their energy, you can store their energy in empty bottles for later use
Maybe you should stay near them...

Your health is reduced. Without proper hands for tools, your block-breaking speed is slower
Leg armor no longer fits your quadrupedal form, and your swimming speed is reduced
Villagers fear you and will actively avoid you
You now closely resemble a friendly spectral creature, though unclear if due to internal magic, you exhibit some unique features

Your body now consists of light blue translucent gauze-like substance. Extremely light, letting you float
Feathery antenna-like structures grow from your forehead - very flexible. They grant new senses detecting nearby creatures' locations
Branch-like wings sprout from your back. With them, you can hover through skies. Below wings, two ribbon-like extensions emerge - purpose unclear, possibly compensating lost leg functions

Your more spectral physique grants new abilities -
Your actions now barely consume satiation
Holding jump lets you ascend and hover freely midair. You also descend slowly

Floating means no footsteps
Amethyst resonates strangely with you: in inventory, you can "use" one amethyst block on another to create amethyst shards
You sense other creatures' energy: detecting entities within range. Damaging others lets you siphon some health
Enhanced perception increases bow damage
Your tiny size lets you enter 1-block spaces easily, and projectiles miss you more often

Your semi-spectral nature brings disadvantages -
Hovering rapidly depletes satiation
Your body can't derive energy from food - only amethyst shards restore satiation. You also heal less from satiation
Your weaker body requires both hands for tools/weapons. You break hard materials slower and deal reduced melee damage.Your max health has reduced greatly either
Floating increases inertia, making stopping harder
Your lower torso vanished - you can't wear leggings or boots
Compared to other forms, you notice this one seems "special": it barely affects your mind and feels less stable. If desired, you could likely revert it relatively easily
Compared to other forms, you notice this one seems "special": it barely affects your mind and feels less stable. If desired, you could likely revert it relatively easily
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.psi_sp.in: Compared to other forms, you notice this one seems "special": it barely affects your mind and feels less stable. If desired, you could likely revert it relatively easily
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.chi_sp.in: Compared to other forms, you notice this one seems "special": it barely affects your mind and feels less stable. If desired, you could likely revert it relatively easily
codex.form.shape-shifter-curse.phi_sp.in: Compared to other forms, you notice this one seems "special": it barely affects your mind and feels less stable. If desired, you could likely revert it relatively easily
